quest.name: By the Grace of Lord Lolorito
journal: Hancock seems to be quite pleased with himself.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: So that building's filled with Garleans...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Some might deem it unwise to loiter outside the gates of the consulate of a hostile empire.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Danger, excitement. Intrigue! Oh, my!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Compared to the Hingan architecture, this is drab and uninspired. Or perhaps I've had my fill of Garlean aesthetics, such as they are.

dialogue.name: HANCOCK
dialogue.text: There is oh so much more I could speak of─the soothing waters of the onsen, the ephemeral delights of the pleasure district─but you are doubtless still weary from your long sea voyage.

dialogue.name: HANCOCK
dialogue.text: Let us retire to the company offices.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Even though this feels just as out of place as the Garlean Consulate, it's a lot more...comforting.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...There is no denying that this place was built for an Ul'dahn.

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Ahhh, the unmistakable scent of wealth and power...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: (I daresay we could travel to Meracydia or the New World and find a man like Hancock waiting for us.)

dialogue.name: EATCASSISTANT
dialogue.text: Greetings, sirs and ladies, and welcome to the Kugane branch offices of the East Aldenard Trading Company.

dialogue.name: HANCOCK
dialogue.text: At long last, we arrive at our destination. May I present to you our humble offices.

dialogue.name: HANCOCK
dialogue.text: We have much to discuss, so I will refrain from further prattle. Come, come, right this way!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I'm not sure how I imagined our time in the Far East unfolding, but it definitely didn't involve Ul'dahns. And especially not these Ul'dahns. Still...whatever works, right?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: He was not exaggerating when he spoke of their wards' efficacy. Whoever wove them did so with consummate skill...

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: Oh, this place takes me back! It reminds me of the workshop of an Ul'dahn lapidary I once served!

dialogue.name: HANCOCK
dialogue.text: I must confess, I am an avid collector of all things Far Eastern. See for yourself. I insist!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Though I am reluctant to take any action whatsoever that could be construed as placing ourselves in Lord Lolorito's debt...we must avail ourselves of what means are available.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Our Ala Mhigan allies placed their faith in us, and I do not intend to disappoint them...

dialogue.name: EATCASSISTANT
dialogue.text: The Scions are always welcome here. Shall I show you inside?

obj.n: Where the Streets Are Paved with Koban
A Good Samurai Is Hard to Find
A Picture Is Worth a Thousand Moms
